example_build.name: Amaranth's Twinguard
example_build.description: Amaranth's TwinguardIn-combat durability+60 Armor+60 Magic ResistanceEndurance:Gain 1 stacks of Endurance every 1 seconds while in combat with enemy champions (max 5 stacks).
